title: International Community Energy Living Labs
summary: The International Community Energy Living Labs (ICELL) research project aims to develop a systematic screening method for designing fossil-free energy systems by examining various international living labs. This project addresses the technical, behavioral, regulatory and legal challenges of developing energy communities, prioritizing attainable zero-emission strategies and energy justice.
green_innovation: TRUE, the project aims to develop innovative solutions for energy communities that contribute to environmental sustainability goals, such as decarbonisation and reducing resource consumption by developing a circular economy.
business_innovation: TRUE, the project aims to develop a new systematic screening method to support the development of fossil-free energy systems.
